Function Documentation

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t ProtoMangleComplete ( ProtoMangleRefT *  pRef,
int32_t *  pAddr,
int32_t *  pPort 
)

Returns TRUE and fills in address and port if Demangler has finished operation successfully.

Parameters
*pRef- module state
*pAddr- storage for address (result==TRUE)
*pPort- storage for port (result==TRUE)
Returns
int32_t - TRUE if complete, else FALSE, or <0 to indicate an error
Version
1.0 04/09/03 (JLB) First Version

References ProtoMangleRefT::eMangleState, FALSE, ProtoMangleRefT::iPeerAddr, ProtoMangleRefT::iPeerPort, and TRUE.

int32_t  iMyPort,
const char *  pSessID 
)

Initiate transaction with demangler service.

Parameters
*pRef- module state
iMyPort- game port
*pSessID- pointer to unique session ID (must be identical between clients)
Version
04/07/03 jbrookes

DIRTYCODE_API void ProtoMangleConnectSocket ( ProtoMangleRefT *  pRef,
intptr_t  uSockRef,
const char *  pSessID 
)

Initiate transaction with demangler service, using the given shared socket ref for UDP probes that are to be sent out over the game port.

Parameters
*pRef- module state
uSockRef- socket reference to use for UDP probes sent over game port
*pSessID- pointer to unique session ID (must be identical between clients)
Version
1.0 08/24/04 (JLB) First Version

References ds_strnzcpy(), ProtoMangleRefT::iGamePort, ProtoMangleRefT::iHostAddr, NetPrintf, ProtoMangleRefT::pHttp, ProtoHttpControl(), ProtoMangleRefT::pSharedProbeSock, SockaddrInGetPort, SocketGetLocalAddr(), SocketImport(), SocketInfo(), and ProtoMangleRefT::strCookie.

DIRTYCODE_API ProtoMangleRefT* ProtoMangleCreate ( const char *  pServer,
int32_t  iPort,
const char *  pGameID,
const char *  pLKey 
)

Allocate module state and prepare for use.

Parameters
*pServer- pointer to server name
iPort- server port
*pGameID- pointer to game feature ID string
*pLKey- pointer to user LKey
Returns
ProtoMangleRefT * - reference pointer (must be passed to all other functions)
Version
1.0 04/03/03 (JLB) First Version
1.1 06/16/03 (JLB) Added server parms as arguments

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t ProtoMangleReport ( ProtoMangleRefT *  pRef,
ProtoMangleStatusE  eStatus,
int32_t  iLatency 
)

Post result report to server.

Parameters
*pRef- mangle ref
eStatus- connection status
iLatency- peer latency (optional, -1 to not send)
Returns
int32_t - zero=success, negative=failure
Note
Report is of the form: 
POST http://demangler.ea.com:3658/connectionStatus
Cookie: sessionID=6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8 
myIP=10.14.221.1&myPort=3250&version=1.0&status=connected&gameFeatureID=madden-ps2-2004&latency=80
Version
1.0 07/18/03 (JLB) First Version

References ds_snzprintf(), ds_strnzcat(), ProtoMangleRefT::eMangleState, ProtoMangleRefT::iHostAddr, ProtoMangleRefT::iPeerPort, PROTOMANGLE_STATUS_FAILED, SocketInAddrGetText(), ProtoMangleRefT::strCookie, and ProtoMangleRefT::strGameID.
